Gets the distance between two objects in this topology. This could be either spatial distance, network distance or any other kind of well defined metric distance.

getNeighborhoodSize

public int getNeighborhoodSize(Location location,
                               int extent,
                               boolean includeOrigin)
This method actually uses the following calculation to determine the number of cells included in a neighborhood. 3n^2 - 3n + 1 RePast calculates neighs using 1 as the first set (not including the origin cell. I deal with this by adding one to the extent to calabrate it with RePast and subtracting 1 from final calculation to exclude the center cell.

Specified by:
getNeighborhoodSize in interface Neighborhood
Specified by:
getNeighborhoodSize in class AbstractNeighborhood
Parameters:
extent -
Returns:
the number of cells in the neghborhood
See Also:
